column4: doesn't it seem primitive in these post-dos days to be running convoluted commands in a terminal?
for days now I've been trying to delete plugins from my realplayer but cannot. It says I don't have permission. Can someone help me do this?
but I don't want to make this a Linux vs. Windows thing.
- sudo or sudo su hasn't worked?
I'm simply asking the question. It just seems a little primitive.
give it a shot. Root Sudo   -- http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/RootSudo
sudo su or just plain sudo
so say I'm in root, how do I list the directory?
